医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
条形码技术揭示癌症转移的秘密转移性癌症的诊断可能是毁灭性的。癌症正在扩散。它可能会传播到体内的多个器官。这可能意味着更多的痛苦，并最终导致死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Barcoding-technology-reveals-secrets-of-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Barcoding-technology-reveals-secrets-of-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e2469f0-99dc-44f1-8aec-37498ffba68d Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:20:49 -0400 Barcoding technology reveals secrets of cancer metastasis
多组学分析揭示钌基抗癌剂的作用机制该研究由谭才平教授、毛宗万教授（中山大学化学学院生物无机与合成化学教育部重点实验室）和李正秋教授（中山大学药学院）领导。暨南大学肿瘤分子生物学教育部重点实验室）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Multi-omics-analysis-reveals-mechanism-of-action-for-ruthenium-based-anti-cancer-agent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Multi-omics-analysis-reveals-mechanism-of-action-for-ruthenium-based-anti-cancer-agent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c39e21e3-d58b-4d2f-9ee1-0af70ab89449 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:14:28 -0400 Multi-omics analysis reveals mechanism of action for ruthenium-based anti-cancer agent
了解 SARS-CoV-2 的病毒感染策略Acta Pharmaceutica Sinica B 发表的这篇新文章讨论了 SARS-CoV-2 ORF10 劫持泛素化机制如何揭示潜在的独特药物靶向位点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Understanding-SARS-CoV-2s-viral-strategies-for-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Understanding-SARS-CoV-2s-viral-strategies-for-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf9f21eb-ef2a-46e3-8c7d-da0ae0c03f73 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:10:41 -0400 Understanding SARS-CoV-2's viral strategies for infection
英国医生转向人工智能聊天机器人进行诊断和记录，但他们是否会将患者隐私置于危险之中？最近的一项调查发现，20% 的英国全科医生在临床实践中使用人工智能聊天机器人，帮助记录、诊断和患者管理。然而，人们仍然对错误、偏见和隐私风险感到担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/UK-doctors-turn-to-AI-chatbots-for-diagnoses-and-documentation-but-are-they-putting-病人-隐私-at-风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/UK-doctors-turn-to-AI-chatbots-for-diagnoses-and-documentation-but-are-they-putting-病人-隐私-at- risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1834cfa-14b5-40c7-8b6c-84579359d2f5 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:05:00 -0400 UK doctors turn to AI chatbots for diagnoses and documentation, but are they putting patient privacy at risk?
研究人员探索抗癌新代谢途径当侵袭性癌症对人体发起入侵时，任何可以减缓或更好地理解这种快节奏攻击的措施都将是有益的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Researchers-explore-new-metabolic-pathway-to-fight-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Researchers-explore-new-metabolic-pathway-to-fight-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d3d1346-d795-4da1-bb81-7950db1bd066 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:04:44 -0400 Researchers explore new metabolic pathway to fight cancer
基金会收到 100,000 美元用于推进多发性硬化症护理多发性硬化症中心联盟 (FCMSC) 最近收到了 EMD Serono Inc. 的 100,000 美元慷慨捐赠，以纪念 June Halper（MSN、APN-C、FAAN、MSCN）。 Halper 女士是多发性硬化症 (MS) 综合护理运动的长期先驱、领先的执业护士和 MS 倡导者，于 2024 年 7 月 24 日去世，享年 86 岁，一直工作到她担任 CMSC 首席执行官的最后几天、FCMSC 和 IOMSN（国际多发性硬化症护士组织）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Foundation-receives-24100000-to-advance-MS-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Foundation-receives-24100000-to-advance-MS-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c88dac47-8b43-458f-ab4b-cfcbb375fab5 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 00:00:03 -0400 Foundation receives $100,000 to advance MS care
研究强调同理心护理对疼痛儿童的重要性无论是手臂酸痛还是害怕注射，孩子出现疼痛时的治疗方式可能会显着影响他们日后应对和控制疼痛的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Study-highlights-importance-of-empathetic-care-for-children-in-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Study-highlights-importance-of-empathetic-care-for-children-in-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c607278-5a7a-48fc-8790-2ae71721525e Wed, 25 Sep 2024 23:50:33 -0400 Study highlights importance of empathetic care for children in pain
无药鼻喷雾剂可有效阻止病毒和细菌感染布里格姆大学的研究人员详细介绍了他们制造的喷雾剂如何提供广谱保护，防止由 COVID-19、流感、日常感冒病毒和引起肺炎的细菌引起的呼吸道感染https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Drug-free-nasal-spray-demonstrates-efficientness-in-blocking-viral-and-bacterial-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Drug-free-nasal-spray-demonstrates-efficientness-in-blocking-viral-and-bacterial-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4525d718-69ff-4c36-abc0-6d146d8eecb7 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 23:46:03 -0400 Drug-free nasal spray demonstrates effectiveness in blocking viral and bacterial infections
研究发现基因变化与唐氏综合症患者患白血病的风险有关患有唐氏综合症的人患白血病的风险更高。现在，哥本哈根大学和斯坦福大学的研究人员通过识别唐氏综合症患者血细胞的特定变化来解释原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Study-uncovers-genic-changes-linked-to-leukemia-risk-in-people-with-Downs-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Study-uncovers-genic-changes-linked-to-leukemia-risk-in-people-with-Downs-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84f56799-da88-41d5-9e5a-7e0ebc48eff2 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 23:29:40 -0400 Study uncovers genetic changes linked to leukemia risk in people with Down's syndrome
研究强调 LGBTQ+ 个体的负面大脑健康结果根据 2024 年 9 月 25 日《神经病学》在线期刊上发表的一项研究，与顺性别者和异性恋者相比，LGBTQ+ 人群可能更有可能出现负面的大脑健康结果，包括患痴呆症和晚年抑郁症的风险更高®，美国神经病学学会的医学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Research-highlights-negative-brain-health-outcomes-among-LGBTQ2b-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Research-highlights-negative-brain-health-outcomes-among-LGBTQ2b-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32a93d80-2cf1-410c-81cf-a4184337f59e Wed, 25 Sep 2024 23:25:01 -0400 Research highlights negative brain health outcomes among LGBTQ+ individuals
